## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                        | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disables the tab.                  | `boolean` | `false` |
| `selected` | `selected` | Marks the tab as the selected one. | `boolean` | `false` |
